name: ``Action Mole a Hole FREE GAME
description:
Action Mole a Hole takes it back old school in this casual arcade game.

Become a Mole and dig, dig, and dig. Sounds like an easy task right? Oh did we mention, watch out for exploding bombs or its gameover! Easy to play, tap left or right, but hard to master. We sneaked in a couple apples and bulbs, these will reward you extra points.

Features:
- Awesome 8 bit retro graphics
- Real time multiplayer
- Unlock the many mole characters, more coming soon
- Simple tap controls. Easy to play

Master those skills and dig your way to the top of the Leaderboard

#moleahole - Use this worldwide!

Play Now for Free! Tell your friends and family
